attributes.action: commission the design of an IT package to help nurses design weekly off duty rotas fairly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petitioner is calling on the government to design a way of improving the problems of designing shift duty rotas for nurses - perhaps an IT package into which can be logged in requests and availability - improving nursing IT skills and offerng better guidelines on human resource management - which I feel would solve a lot of conflict about the following issues .

a) the nature of special requests (eg should requests for going to a wedding
be a priority over taking time to have a knee operation ?) 
b) time - owing

Research shows that the average health care practitioner donates between 8 - 15 hours extra (freely) of his/her time to ward duties. Does the PM ever say thank - you ?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
